definition: abbr. for Israel 以色列[Yi3 se4 lie4]
to use/by means of/according to/in order to/because of/at (a certain date or place)
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]

sentences.english: Christians believe that Emanuel is the prophet Isaiah's prophecy of the Messiah.
sentences.chinese: 基督徒相信以馬內利就是先知以賽亞所預言的彌賽亞。

sentences.english: Its outspread wings will cover the breadth of your land, O Immanuel !
sentences.chinese: 以馬內利阿，他展開翅膀，遍滿你的地。

sentences.english: Emannuel, God is with us, Blessed Redeemer, Living Word.
sentences.chinese: 以馬內利，與人同在的神，聖潔的救主，永活的道。

sentences.english: Main page for Little Rock Chinese Immanuel Baptist Church.
sentences.chinese: 小巖城以馬內利華語浸信會主頁。

sentences.english: The lamb is all the glory Of Immanuel's land.
sentences.chinese: 羔羊榮耀今充滿，以馬內利之境。

sentences.english: Come, come Emmanuel, O Child of Love and Peace.
sentences.chinese: 以馬內利，慈愛和平的嬰孩請來臨。

definition: variant of 曉喻|晓喻[xiao3 yu4]
Holy Father/God the Father (in the Christian Trinity)
to exhort (sb) to live a virtuous life (Buddhism)/to beg for alms
El Niño (meteorology)/Holy Infant (cf biblical nativity story)
Your presence brings light to my humble dwelling/see also 蓬蓽生光|蓬荜生光[peng2 bi4 sheng1 guang1]
to pray on behalf of sb
